bibl.title: Hesperos. Studies in Ancient Greek Poetry Presented to M.L. West on his Seventieth Birthday
bibl.note: Voir en part. pp. 161-165, à propos des travaux d'A.E. Housman relevant de la papyrologie littéraire.
bibl.seg: P.J. FINGLASS, C. COLLARD and N.J. RICHARDSON (Edd.), Hesperos. Studies in Ancient Greek Poetry Presented to M.L. West on his Seventieth Birthday (Oxford, 2007) pp. 145-169.
